statements: SELECT * FROM malware_samples ORDER BY sample_name ASC;
SELECT sample_name, file_size FROM malware_samples WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT sample_id, file_type FROM malware_samples WHERE detection_score > 0.8 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT file_type, detection_score FROM malware_samples WHERE file_type LIKE 'exe%';
SELECT sample_name, file_type, detection_score FROM malware_samples WHERE file_type = 'trojan' ORDER BY detection_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC, file_size ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sample_id, file_size, sample_name FROM malware_samples WHERE detection_score > 0.8
SELECT sample_name, file_type FROM malware_samples WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size DESC
SELECT * FROM malware_samples WHERE detection_score < 0.5 AND file_type = 'exe'
SELECT file_type, AVG(detection_score) AS avg_score FROM malware_samples GROUP BY file_type HAVING AVG(detection_score) > 0.5
SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples;
SELECT malware_name, file_size FROM MalwareSamples WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT malware_name, file_type FROM MalwareSamples WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MalwareCharacteristics WHERE characteristic_name = 'vulnerability';
SELECT malware_id, malware_name, upload_date FROM MalwareSamples ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT malware_name, file_type, file_size FROM MalwareSamples WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples JOIN MalwareCharacteristics ON MalwareSamples.malware_id = MalwareCharacteristics.malware_id WHERE MalwareSamples.malware_name LIKE 'Ransomware%' ORDER BY characteristic_name ASC, upload_date DESC;
SELECT malware_name, upload_date FROM MalwareSamples WHERE file_type IN ('exe', 'doc') AND upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;

SELECT malware_name, characteristic_name, characteristic_value FROM MalwareSamples JOIN MalwareCharacteristics ON MalwareSamples.malware_id = MalwareCharacteristics.malware_id WHERE MalwareSamples.file_size < 500 OR MalwareCharacteristics.characteristic_value LIKE '%infected%' ORDER BY malware_name ASC, characteristic_name DESC;

SELECT malware_name, upload_date, COUNT(*) AS total_characteristics FROM MalwareSamples JOIN MalwareCharacteristics ON MalwareSamples.malware_id = MalwareCharacteristics.malware_id GROUP BY malware_name, upload_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_characteristics DESC, malware_name ASC, upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples;
SELECT sample_id, file_name, file_size FROM MalwareSamples ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM MalwareSamples WHERE detection_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ThreatAnalysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Malicious';
SELECT analysis_date, sample_id FROM ThreatAnalysis JOIN MalwareSamples ON ThreatAnalysis.sample_id = MalwareSamples.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM MalwareSamples ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM ThreatAnalysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%Suspicious%';
SELECT DISTINCT malware_type, os_platform FROM MalwareCharacteristics WHERE os_platform = 'Windows';
SELECT AVG(detection_score) AS avg_score FROM MalwareSamples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM malware_samples;
SELECT file_path, file_size FROM malware_samples WHERE file_size > 10000;
SELECT characteristic_name, description FROM malware_characteristics ORDER BY characteristic_name DESC;
SELECT sample_id, COUNT(characteristic_id) AS num_characteristics FROM sample_characteristics GROUP BY sample_id;
SELECT sample_id, upload_date, analysis_date FROM malware_samples JOIN threat_analysis ON malware_samples.sample_id = threat_analysis.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM malware_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, file_path FROM malware_samples WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT file_path, upload_date FROM malware_samples WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT sample_id, characteristic_name, severity FROM malware_samples JOIN sample_characteristics ON malware_samples.sample_id = sample_characteristics.sample_id JOIN malware_characteristics ON sample_characteristics.characteristic_id = malware_characteristics.characteristic_id;
SELECT sample_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM threat_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-04-01' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM MalwareSamples WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT sample_name, upload_time FROM MalwareSamples WHERE sample_type = 'Trojan' ORDER BY upload_time DESC;

SELECT sample_name, characteristic_name, characteristic_value FROM MalwareSamples INNER JOIN MalwareCharacteristics ON MalwareSamples.sample_id = MalwareCharacteristics.sample_id WHERE sample_name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT analysis_id, threat_level, analysis_detail FROM ThreatAnalysis WHERE analysis_time >= '2021-01-01' AND threat_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples ORDER BY upload_time DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type, file_size FROM MalwareSamples WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT sample_name, threat_level FROM MalwareSamples ms JOIN ThreatAnalysis ta ON ms.sample_id = ta.sample_id WHERE ta.threat_level = 'High';

SELECT mc.sample_id, mc.characteristic_name, mc.characteristic_value, ms.upload_time FROM MalwareCharacteristics mc JOIN MalwareSamples ms ON mc.sample_id = ms.sample_id WHERE ms.upload_time >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT mc.characteristic_name, mc.characteristic_value, mcat.category_name FROM MalwareCharacteristics mc JOIN SampleCategories sc ON mc.sample_id = sc.sample_id JOIN MalwareCategories mcat ON sc.category_id = mcat.category_id WHERE mc.characteristic_name LIKE '%vulnerability%';
